GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for a specified article_id

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article with the given article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments the votes on an article with the given article_id by a given number and serves the updated article

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment by the comment_id
